title: Mobile-Based Practical Mathematics Problem-Solving Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Mobile-optimized short-term course for practicing professionals, combining project-based learning and gamification in a practice-centered design.

learning_goals: Over 80% of learners can solve math problems based on real-world work scenarios through project-based learning
Apply the design thinking process to systematically deconstruct complex mathematical problems and propose three or more solution strategies
Practice algorithms learned through flipped learning on a gamification platform with over 90% participation
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
